Interface FontUtil

All Known Implementing Classes:
AwtFontUtil, FxFontUtil
public interface FontUtil
Interface for Font handling utility classes. The concrete implementation is automatically chosen at runtime for use by the TextUtil class.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    FontUtil.FontTypes
    Font type enumeration.

      Font getDefaultFont()
      Retrieves the default font used by the system or application.
      Returns:

    • getFont

      default Font getFont(String fontspec)
      Retrieves a Font object by parsing a font specification string.
      Parameters:
      fontspec - the font specification string that defines the font's properties.
      Returns:
      a Font object derived from the default font with the specified characteristics.

    • getFont

      default Font getFont(FontDef fontDef)
      Retrieves a Font object based on the given FontDef specification.
      Parameters:
      fontDef - the font definition that specifies the font's properties
      Returns:
      a Font object that matches the specified font definition

    • deriveFont

      Font deriveFont(Font font, FontDef fontDef)
      Derives a new Font object based on a given font and font definition specifications.
      Parameters:
      font - the original Font object to be used as a base for deriving the new font
      fontDef - the font definition detailing the specific attributes to modify or apply
      Returns:
      a new Font object derived from the original font with modifications specified by the font definition
